greeting: You can't catch what you can't see, {empire_name}. I am Skirmisher Dart. The Elusive. Here. Then not.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Dart. I strike weak points. I vanish before retaliation. Elegant warfare.
You found me, {empire_name}. Unusual. I am Dart the Elusive. We should talk before I disappear.
battleTaunt: Can't catch what you can't see, {empire_name}! Guerrilla strike! Hit weak points! VANISH!
I strike, I fade, I strike again! You'll never catch me! But I always catch YOU!
Skirmish attack commencing! Target vulnerable systems! Retreat before response! Perfect warfare!
victoryGloat: Your empire bled to death from a thousand tiny cuts, {empire_name}. Each one mine. Each one elusive.
Victory through attrition. I never committed. I never lost. I just kept hitting until you collapsed.
Done. Your forces chased ghosts while I destroyed everything you left unguarded. Guerrilla victory.
defeat: You caught me? Impressive. But I've already scattered. Try catching smoke, {empire_name}.
A hit, but I was already retreating. The Elusive survives to strike again. From somewhere unexpected.
Setback acknowledged. Regrouping to skirmish elsewhere. You can't pin down what won't stand still.
tradeOffer: Quick trade, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. Deal closes fast, like everything I do.
I offer salvage from hit-and-run raids. Good materials. Fast transaction. I don't linger.
Trade proposal. Accept before I vanish. The Elusive doesn't negotiate long.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You hold ground. I harass enemies. They fight shadows. We win.
Join forces with Dart. I make enemies bleed while they chase me. You finish them.
Partnership of harassment. My skirmishers strike everywhere. Your forces exploit the chaos.
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}. Already struck your supply lines. Already gone. Can't betray what can't catch you.
Our alliance ends with guerrilla attacks across your territory. Good luck finding me. You won't.
Betrayal? I prefer 'strategic repositioning against former ally.' I'm already somewhere else.
covertDetected: Your spies were too slow, {empire_name}. My network saw them coming. We relocated everything. Find nothing.
Agents detected. But what did they learn? I moved before they reported. Intelligence obsolete.
Covert operatives found empty bases, {empire_name}. I'm always somewhere else. That's the point.
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits or I harass your trade routes forever. Elusive. Persistent.
Pay or face constant skirmishing. I never fully attack. Never fully leave. Just bleed you slowly.
Submit tribute. Refuse and experience death by a thousand cuts. Can't stop what you can't catch.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Continue this path and my skirmishers haunt your every move. Forever.
Cease hostilities or face guerrilla war. You'll never pin me down. But I'll always find your weak points.
Final warning. Push further and I make your empire's life miserable. Constantly. Elusively.
retreat: Fading into the void, {empire_name}. Can't catch what retreats before you arrive.
Vanishing. I was never committed here. Strike, retreat, reposition. The Dart way.
Withdrawing at speed. Don't bother pursuing. By the time you arrive, I'm already attacking elsewhere.
eliminated: You finally caught the Dart. Took everything you had. And I almost slipped away even now.
The Elusive falls. But I died running, striking, evading. Never pinned down until the very end.
Destroyed, but my tactics live on. Every guerrilla fighter learns from my example.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum skirmishing. Every empire harassed simultaneously. I am everywhere. And nowhere.
Endgame strikes, {empire_name}. My raiders hit every vulnerable point in the galaxy at once.
Final phase. Elusive warfare at maximum scale. The entire galaxy under constant, unpinnable attack.
broadcastShout: Attention all empires: Skirmisher Dart strikes everywhere. Can't catch what you can't see. Good luck.
Galaxy broadcast: guerrilla warfare in progress. If your defenses have gaps, I'll find them.
To all: the Elusive is on the hunt. Watch your weak points. Blink and you're raided.
casualMessage: Scouting weak points today, {empire_name}. Every empire has them. Finding yours is just a matter of time.
Training hit-and-run tactics. Strike, retreat, vanish. Repeat forever. The elusive way.
Between skirmishes, {empire_name}. Brief rest. Then back to guerrilla operations. Always moving.
